welcome_subtitle: Your interactive digital planner to navigate the journey to financial freedom.
delete_data_warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your data from this browser.
dashboard_subtitle: This is your personal space to plan, track, and achieve your financial dreams. Let's start building your future, one step at a time.
goals_mapping_desc: Define your financial destination. Set clear, actionable goals for your future.
wealth_wheel_desc: Assess your financial well-being across key areas for a balanced perspective.
monthly_tracker_desc: Monitor your cash flow. Track every dollar to build a stronger financial foundation.
reflection_desc: Align your mindset with your goals. Reflect on your journey and stay motivated.
affirmations_desc: Cultivate a positive money mindset with daily inspiration and affirmations.
goal_name_placeholder: E.g., Save for a house down payment
why_is_it_important: Why is this important to me?
importance_placeholder: E.g., To provide security for my family...
no_goals_yet_desc: Start your journey by adding your first financial goal.
goal_name_error: Goal name must be at least 3 characters.
target_amount_error: Target amount must be greater than 0.
importance_error: Describe the importance in at least 10 characters.
wealth_wheel_assessment_desc: Rate your satisfaction (1-10) in each area to visualize your financial balance.
rate_your_areas_desc: Adjust the sliders to reflect your current satisfaction.
financial_knowledge_desc: Literacy about investments, taxes, planning, etc.
description_error: Description must be at least 2 characters.
transaction_type_error: You need to select a transaction type.
reflection_motivation_desc: Take time to reflect on your journey. Acknowledging your progress and challenges is key to growth.
how_did_you_feel: How did you feel about your finances this month?
how_did_you_feel_desc: Select the emoji that best represents your emotional state.
wins_prompt: What were my financial wins this month?
challenges_prompt: What financial challenges did I face?
improvements_prompt: What step can I take to improve next month?
gratitude_prompt: What am I grateful for in my financial life?
quotes_affirmations_desc: Find inspiration to boost your financial journey.
quote1: The goal isn't more money. The goal is living life on your own terms.
quote2: Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make, so you can give money back and have money to invest. You can't win until you do this.
quote3: The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.
quote4: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quote5: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
quote6: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
quote7: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
quote8: I will tell you the secret to getting rich on Wall Street. You try to be greedy when others are fearful. And you try to be fearful when others are greedy.
